name: lrn_graphql
description: STEPS:   1. >npm init (once time, just enter accep default)   2. >npm i express express-graphql graphql   3. update package.json :      "main": "server.js",   4. >npm install --save-dev nodemon   5. update package.json :      "scripts": {       "devStart": "nodemon server.js"     },   6.  >npm run devStart
